E1.comment: Click this cell to view the chart!

A9.content: 1. Click cells E1, E3, or E5 to view charts

A10.content: 2. Right-click any cell to create a new chart

A11.content: 3. Right-click a chart cell to edit the chart script

A12.content: 4. Charts use RexxJS to process data from cells

A13.content: 5. Full access to all spreadsheet functions and Chart.js options
